heroDescription: Andro-Switch: the world's first male thermal contraception medical device.

innovationStats.willingnessDesc: Europeans willing to use the Andro-Switch solution

innovationFeatures.desc1: Innovative solution protected by international patents

cardsSection.card1Title: MALE CONTRACEPTION: WHERE DO WE STAND?
cardsSection.card1Subtitle: Discover the current state of contraceptive solutions
cardsSection.card1Detail: Explore the current landscape of male contraception, its advancements, and the challenges to overcome for better accessibility.
cardsSection.card2Subtitle: An eco-friendly and ethical product, part of a slow-low tech path and short-circuit approach.
cardsSection.card2Detail: Discover our revolutionary technology that combines efficiency, safety, and accessibility for natural fertility control.
cardsSection.card3Detail: Understand how male contraception is redefining the balance of reproductive responsibilities in modern couples.
cardsSection.card4Detail: Discover the results of our rigorous clinical trials demonstrating the effectiveness and safety of our solution.
cardsSection.card5Detail: Discover authentic testimonials from those who have chosen to take responsibility for their contraception.
cardsSection.card6Subtitle: Towards a contraceptive and economic revolution: the urgency of collective action.
cardsSection.card6Detail: Explore how innovation in male contraception can transform reproductive health and gender equality.

visionSection.title: Long-term Vision:
visionSection.description: Open Andro-Switch to the markets of Europe, the USA, and Canada.
visionSection.phase1Desc: Initial launch in European markets with local partners
visionSection.phase2Desc: Expansion to the United States and Canada
visionSection.phase3Desc: Worldwide presence with major public health impact
visionSection.faqAns1: Regulation, social acceptability, and market access
visionSection.faqAns2: Robust clinical studies and strategic partnerships
visionSection.faqAns3: Revolutionizing access to safe male contraception

roadmapSection.title: Strategic Roadmap
roadmapSection.subtitle: Andro-Switch
roadmapSection.visionDesc: Vision to long-term: here's what we've done, here's where we're headed, and this is for all of us!
roadmapSection.statsDesc: AI Tools in development for professionals healthcare and users
roadmapSection.statsFullDesc: From current initiatives through worldwide availability, our roadmap spans 2024-2030+ delivering integrated AI solutions, clinical validation, market expansion, and global accessibility.
roadmapSection.phase1Desc: Global awareness campaign • AI tool development
roadmapSection.phase4Desc: Product in pharmacies • SDG impact achieved
roadmapSection.calculatorDesc: Visualize the direct impact of your investment on the contraceptive revolution

collaborationSection.title: Let's Collaborate
collaborationSection.subtitle: on the Future
collaborationSection.description: We are looking for visionary partners to accelerate the adoption of innovative and accessible contraceptive solutions.

footerSection.tagline: Revolutionizing male contraception for a better future

gate.title: Andro-Switch
gate.description1: The world's first male thermal contraception medical device

card1.title: Product
card1.fullDescription: A revolutionary approach to contraception inspired by natural thermal principles and the perfect symmetry of the golden ratio.

card2.title: Technology
card2.fullDescription: Advanced thermal technology that works with the body's natural processes, completely reversible and non-invasive.

card3.title: Society
card3.fullDescription: Aligns with France 2030's strategic priorities for innovative medical devices and global SDG commitments.

card4.title: Market
card4.fullDescription: Meeting critical demand for contraceptive equity among women while attracting male investor interest.
